mapper.select: SELECT URLBH, URLBM, URLLJ, URLMS, URLLX FROM PF_RESURL
mapper.insert: insert into PF_RESURL (URLBH, URLBM, URLLJ, URLMS, URLLX) values (#{urlbh,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{urlbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urllj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urlms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urllx,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PF_RESURL WHERE URLLJ=#{urllj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND URLLX=#{urllx,jdbcType=CHAR}
